alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 12 at 8:03AM CDT until August 12 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PULASKI...SOUTHEASTERN ALEXANDER...SOUTHWESTERN BALLARD...NORTHEASTERN MISSISSIPPI AND EAST CENTRAL SCOTT COUNTIES... At 802 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Horseshoe Lake Conservation Area, or 10 miles west of Cairo, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Cairo, Mounds, Mound City, Wyatt, Horseshoe Lake Conservation Area, Olive Branch, Diehlstadt and Wilson City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 1 and 7. Interstate 57 in Missouri between Mile Markers 10 and 21. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
